This day Alexander Anderson came before me a Justice of peace for the County aforesaid and made oath that the above account of four hundred and seventy six dollars is correct and true to the best of his knowledge and further makes oath he was at the time a good and loyal citizen of the United States.
Given under my hand this 10th day of June 1867
